pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: proposal for new behavior

content.raw:
Per f2f: Would be nice to try and make frame specification more physical, maybe not make all element poses \(e.g. visual / collision / sensor\) with implicit frames; rather, than use explicit frames.

Trade-off with usage \+ ease of use – vs – frame “pollution”; also topological concerns.
content.html:
Per f2f: Would be nice to try and make frame specification more physical, maybe not make all element poses (e.g. visual / collision / sensor) with implicit frames; rather, than use explicit frames.

Trade-off with usage + ease of use – vs – frame “pollution”; also topological concerns.
